segments.text: Sorry sir . But you can ’ t go into the OR .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , but tell me what ’ s happening . Give it to me straight please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was touching girl for a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She will be OK . She is a tough cookie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In my opinion she will up about soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s good to hear . She is usually full of vein and vigor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe it . Well , I ’ Ve got to go back in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Just relax , OK ? Go and got a cup of coffee .
segments.speaker: S1
